thread.title: Dude handles an unsolicited dick pic like a true troll (6 Photos)
thread.title_full: Dude handles an unsolicited dick pic like a true troll (6 Photos)

author: Martin
title: Dude handles an unsolicited dick pic like a true troll (6 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
I’ll never understand why someone would send out a dick pic to a random number, or to someone they just met. Call me old-fashioned, but that’s really not my style. I’d rather attempt to woo with the rest of me, then send a picture of an out-of-context meat log and say “Hey…wanna smash?” But hey.. different strokes for different folks. 
Now, we’ve had some other reactions to dick pics on the site before, usually from girls trolling oblivious dudes. There’s also been the occasional dude that’s shown up too with a hilarious response or two to a wrong number dicking. 
This guy here, Imgur user Syntax1985 , I think he takes the cake, handling an unwanted dick pic with just the right prescription of trolling. 2 
According to his post, he’s gotten a few unwanted dick pics before and he always pretends to be a doctor, but usually the person on the other end tells him to fuck off and that’s the end of it. 
But not this guy. This guy goes for it. 3 
Looks like someone’s been dipping in a dirty pool and doesn’t have insurance. 
So the “doctor” gives him a home remedy to fix it… which is essentially pizza dough. 4 
Of course, at this point she should be asking questions like:“Are you real doctor?”“What will this do to my penis?”“What did you think of it?” 
Instead he takes the advice. 5 
Dick poster (my name for him) tries and remedy and bam, he’s got a breadstick instead of his… you know… 
Dick Pic troll level: Expert. Advertisement
